headline: AppLovin to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., October 01, 2025--AppLovin Corporation, (NASDAQ: APP) ("AppLovin" or the "Company") the leading marketing platform, today announced it will report financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025 on Wednesday, November 5, 2025 after the U.S. stock market closes.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks to Target This Week
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.
